Title: His hometown has changed appearance
Designer: Li Enlin (李恩林)Fang Shicong (方世聪)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The sailor, returning home for the Dragon Boat Festival (duanwu jie 端午节) carrying sticky rice dumplings (zongzi 粽子) in a shopping net, no longer recognizes his hometown.
